titleStmt.title: The subjects joy for the Kings restoration, cheerfully made known in a sacred masque gratefully made publique for His Sacred Majesty / by the author of Inqvisitio Anglicana.
titleStmt.author: Sadler, Anthony, b. 1610.

notesStmt.note: "Epistle dedicatory" and "To the candid reader" signed: Anthony Sadler.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
